Text: Associate Rotation to another group Cc Andrea As I mentioned to you in our conversation this afternoon I have found another group to rotate to Its Project Genesys in EES headed by Wayne Andrews I have spoken with Todd Busby with whom I currently work in the Back Office Commercialization team ENW and he has agreed for me to move to this project I will have all the details Co cost center etc for you by Monday next week Pl let me know if there is any other information you need from me or my supervisors Thanks Shruti Shruti GandhiGupta
